source:
This notebook creates views over the SAP HR data to ensure all Staff_Number or Pers_No columns are aligned.

**Method**

1. If the 6-digit SAP code starts with a 4, it can also be found prefixed with 50
2. If the 6-digit SAP code starts with a 5, it can also be found prefixed with 00


**SQL Code**

```
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5 
        THEN concat('00',Staff_Number) 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4 
        THEN concat('50',Staff_Number)
        ELSE Staff_Number
    End as Staff_Number
```

%%sql

-- Creates view odw_standardised_db.vw_absences

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_absences
    AS 
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5 
            THEN concat('00',Staff_Number) 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4 
            THEN concat('50',Staff_Number)
            ELSE Staff_Number
        End as Staff_Number,
        Abs_Type,
        Sickness_Group,
        Start_Date,
        End_Date,
        Attendance_or_Absence_Type,
        Days,
        Hrs,
        Start,
        End_time,
        Cal_days,
        Work_Schedule_Rule,
        Wk_Hrs,
        Hrs_Day,
        WkDys,
        Annual_Leave_Start 
    FROM odw_standardised_db.absences;

%%sql

-- Creates view odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses
    AS 
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5 
            THEN concat('00',Staff_Number) 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4 
            THEN concat('50',Staff_Number)
            ELSE Staff_Number
        End as Staff_Number,
        Street_and_House_Number,
        `2nd_Address_Line`,
        City,
        District,
        Postal_Code,
        Region_State_Province_Count,
        Start_Date,
        End_Date,
        Charting_Officer,
        Charting_Officer_for_Inspector,
        Subs_PS_Group,
        Tel_No,
        Personal_Mobile,
        Work_Mobile,
        Chngd_on
        
    FROM odw_standardised_db.addresses;

%%sql

-- Creates view odw_standardised_db.vw_email

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_email
    AS 
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5 
            THEN concat('00',Staff_Number) 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4 
            THEN concat('50',Staff_Number)
            ELSE Staff_Number
        End as Staff_Number,
        First_name,
        Last_name,
        Email_Address,
        `Text:_Line_Manager`,
        `LM_E-mail`

        
    FROM odw_standardised_db.email;

%%sql

-- Creates view odw_standardised_db.vw_leave

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_leave
    AS 
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5 
            THEN concat('00',Staff_Number) 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4 
            THEN concat('50',Staff_Number)
            ELSE Staff_Number
        End as Staff_Number,
        Number,
        Deduction,
        Ded_from,
        Ded_To,
        Absence_Quota_Type

        
    FROM odw_standardised_db.leave;

%%sql

-- Creates view odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers
    AS 
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 5 
            THEN concat('00',Pers_No) 
            WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 4 
            THEN concat('50',Pers_No)
            ELSE Pers_No
        End as Pers_No,
        Last_name,
        First_name,
        CoCd,
        Company_Code,
        Loc,
        Location,
        PS_Group,
        Pay_Band_Description,
        Org_Unit,
        Organizational_Unit,
        PA,
        PSubarea,
        Personnel_Subarea,
        WorkC,
        Work_Contract,
        Org_Start_Date,
        Leaving,
        Act,
        Action_Type,
        ActR,
        Reason_for_Action,
        S,
        Employment_Status,
        Employee_No,
        Position,
        Position_1,
        Annual_Salary,
        Curr,
        User_ID,
        Email_Address,
        Pers_No_1,
        Name_of_Manager_OM,
        Manager_Position,
        Manager_Position_Text,
        `LM_E-mail`

    FROM odw_standardised_db.leavers;

%%sql

-- Creates view odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_specialisms
    AS 
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5 
            THEN concat('00',Staff_Number) 
            WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4 
            THEN concat('50',Staff_Number)
            ELSE Staff_Number
        End as Staff_Number,
        First_name,
        Last_name,
        Qualification_Name,
        Proficien
        

    FROM odw_standardised_db.specialisms;
